Question
========
A consumer organization gathered information on the price of a consultation (of half an hour) with five different psychologists. The average price was $\euro160$. Having contacted four of these psychologists by phone, we know that the prices for their consultations are $\euro 120, \euro 150, \euro 170, en~\euro 220$ were. TRUE is the price of the last psychologist with whom there was no telephone contact?

Answerlist
----------
* $\euro100$
* $\euro140$
* $\euro150$
* $\euro170$
